title: My client is tripping out
body: I recently redownloaded League after having problems logging in with patch 6.20, and now when I log into the client it looks like the old client from like a year or two ago and I can't click on my friends list or notifications and some other stuff. anyone know whats up?

replies.body:
Sometimes during patching, your client can miss specific files or have leftover files from a previous installation. I definitely recommend completing a [repair of your game files](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq5) to see if it resolves this.

Let me know if it did.

It happens, repair the client:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool

You can also click on the "?" on the right top of the client before clicking "Launch".
